hero.badge: Botlhale jo bo Thephilweng jwa Mzansi
hero.title: Lefelo la Gago la Taolo ya Ditharabololo tsa Loago
hero.subtitle: Tlhama diteng tse di gakgamatsang ka dipuo tsotlhe tse 11 tsa molao. E tlhametswe Baafrika Borwa, bakeng sa Baafrika Borwa.

features.title: E Diretswe Mzansi
features.subtitle: Purple Glow ga se feela go ranolwa—e tlhaloganya setso. Go tswa mo puong ya metse go ya go Seafrikanse sa dikgwebo.

aiEngine.title: Enjini ya Diteng tsa AI
aiEngine.description: Gemini 2.5 Flash + Imagen 3 e matlafalatsa diposo tsa gago. Tlhama mokwalo, ditshwantsho le dibidio tse di ikamanyetsang le babogedi ba SA.

multilingual.title: Dipuo tse 11, Sethala se le Sengwe
multilingual.description: Posa ka Setswana mo mosong, Seafrikanse mo motsotswaneng, Sekgowa mo maitseboeng. Fetola dipuo fa gare ga seele.

scheduling.title: Thulaganyo e e Botlhale
scheduling.description: AI e ithuta dinako tse di botlhokwa tsa go posa go babogedi ba gago. Rulaganya diteng tsa kgwedi ka metsotso e le 10.

step1.title: Tlhalosa Maikutlo a Gago
step1.description: Bolelela Purple Glow gore o rekisa eng kgotsa o rotloetsa eng. Tlhopha mokgwa wa gago: Mzansi Cool, Corporate, kgotsa Cyberpunk.

step2.title: AI e Tlhama Diteng
step2.description: Enjini ya rona e e matlhafalatswang ke Gemini e tlhama diposo tse di rulagantsweng go ya ka sethala ka ditshwantsho mo metsotsong.

step3.title: Rulaganya & Posa
step3.description: Sekaseka, baakanya kgotsa rulaganya. Purple Glow e dira tse dingwe—gape e akanya dinako tse di botlhokwa tsa go posa.

testimonials.title: E Tshepilwe ke Bakgwebi ba Afrika Borwa

thabo.quote: Purple Glow e nthusize gore ke gole go tswa mo go 500 go ya kwa go 5,000 balatedi mo dikgweding tse 3. Diteng tsa Setswana di otla ka tsela e e farologaneng.
thabo.name: Thabo M.
thabo.role: Leina la Diaparo tsa Mebileng Joburg

zanele.quote: Jaanong nka kgona go posa ka dipuo tsotlhe tse 11 ntle le go hira moranodi. Se se fetotse papadi ya dikgwebo tsa metse.
zanele.name: Zanele K.
zanele.role: Mmong wa Lori ya Dijo Durban

pieter.quote: AI e tlhaloganya diane tsa Seafrikanse botoka go feta lephata la me la papatso. Ons is baie impressed.
pieter.name: Pieter v.d.M.

pricing.title: Ditlhwatlhwa tse di Bonalang. Ga go na Ditshenyegelo tse di Fitlhegileng.
pricing.subtitle: Simolola mahala. Gola fa o gola. Khansela nako nngwe le nngwe.

free.name: The Hustle
features: Diposo tsa AI tse 5 ka kgwedi

pro.name: Motlhami
features: Tlhagiso ya Mokwalo e e sa Feleng

business.name: Mogul
features: Dikhrediti tsa Ditshwantsho le Dibidio tse 200
Molaodi wa Akhaonto yo o Ikokobeditseng

credits.title: O tlhoka maatla a a oketsegileng?
credits.subtitle: Dikhrediti tsa ditshwantsho kgotsa dibidio di a fela? Tlatsa ka bonako ntle le go fetola ngwadiso ya gago.

contact.title: Ikgolaganye le Rona
contact.subtitle: O na le dipotso? Re fano go thusa.
contact.name: Leina la Gago

footer.tagline: E tlhamilwe mo Afrika Borwa, bakeng sa Afrika Borwa.

login.title: O Amogelwa Gape
login.subtitle: Tsena mo akhaontong ya gago ya Purple Glow
login.adminTip: MAELE: Dirisa imeile e e nang le "admin" go fitlhelela Admin Dashboard

scheduleModal.title: Rulaganya Poso
scheduleModal.aiBestTimes: Dinako tse di Siameng Thata tsa AI
scheduleModal.aiDescription: AI ya rona e sekasekile mekgwa ya go tsenela ya babogedi ba gago. Dinako tse di bona kgatlhego e e kwa godimo:
scheduleModal.postsScheduledBefore: diposo tse di rulagantsweng pele ga nako e

contentGenerator.title: Motlhami wa Diteng
contentGenerator.topicPlaceholder: mohlala, Go tsenngwa ga ditlhako tse disha, Lebenkele la kofi la selegae, Kgwebo e ntsha ya theknoloji
contentGenerator.customPlaceholder: Oketsa dihashtagi tse di rileng, dikgatiso, kgotsa dikgetho tsa setaele...

smartSuggestions.title: Ditshitshinyo tse di Botlhale tsa AI
smartSuggestions.subtitle: E maatlafalediwa ke tshekatsheko ya babogedi le mekgwa ya go tsenela
smartSuggestions.description: Go ya ka tiro ya babogedi ba gago, tse ke dinako tse di siameng thata tsa go posa:
smartSuggestions.adjustTone: Fetola modumo wa gago go ya ka gore o posa leng:
smartSuggestions.updateNote: Ditshitshinyo di mpshafatswa go ya ka data ya go tsenela ya babogedi ba gago
